verses.text: A eb' chuc spensar sna eb' to malaj Dios. Junlajanxonhej ix aj sjuanel spensar eb'. Yelxo val te chuc sk'ulej eb'. Manhxalaj mach sk'ulan vach'il.
Ato d'a satchaanh q'uelanemta Dios d'a anima, yic syila' tato ay eb' syak'och spensar d'ay, yic syilpaxi tato naan yuj eb'.
A juntzanh b'eyb'al chuc sb'eyb'alej eb' smasanil. Junlajanxonhej tz'aj sjuvib'at eb'. Manhxalaj junoc mach tzato b'eyb'alan vach' b'eyb'al. Toton manhxa val junoc.
Icha val to malaj spensar eb' sk'ulan chucal chi'. A eb' chi' satanel eb' yetchonhab', icha val to svael eb' yaj eb', max yal-laj sb'a eb' d'a Dios.
Tz'ib'xi eb' yuj xivelal vach'chom malaj tas xib'tan eb'. A Dios ix saclemancanb'at sb'aquil eb' ajk'ool, q'uixvelal ix ajcan eb' yujto ix paticajel eb' yuj Dios.
Comonoc a d'a tzalan Sion scot co colnab'il a onh israel onh tic. Ayic ol yak'anxi svach'k'olal Dios d'a quib'anh, ol tzalaj co k'ool a onh yinhtil onh vinhaj Jacob tic. Ol el lenaj ol quila'.
